ahrs_float_utils.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #ifndef AHRS_FLOAT_UTILS_H
00002 #define AHRS_FLOAT_UTILS_H
00003 
00004 #include "subsystems/ahrs/ahrs_magnetic_field_model.h"
00005 
00006 static inline void ahrs_float_get_euler_from_accel_mag(struct FloatEulers* e, struct Int32Vect3* accel, struct Int32Vect3* mag) {
00007   /* get phi and theta from accelerometer */
00008   struct FloatVect3 accelf;
00009   ACCELS_FLOAT_OF_BFP(accelf, *accel);
00010   const float phi   = atan2f(-accelf.y, -accelf.z);
00011   const float cphi = cosf(phi);
00012   const float theta = atan2f(cphi*accelf.x, -accelf.z);
00013 
00014   /* get psi from magnetometer */
00015   /* project mag on local tangeant plane */
00016   struct FloatVect3 magf;
00017   MAGS_FLOAT_OF_BFP(magf, *mag);
00018   const float sphi   = sinf(phi);
00019   const float ctheta = cosf(theta);
00020   const float stheta = sinf(theta);
00021   const float mn = ctheta * magf.x + sphi*stheta*magf.y + cphi*stheta*magf.z;
00022   const float me =     0. * magf.x + cphi       *magf.y - sphi       *magf.z;
00023   float psi = -atan2f(me, mn) + atan2(AHRS_H_Y, AHRS_H_X);
00024   if (psi > M_PI) psi -= 2.*M_PI; if (psi < -M_PI) psi+= 2.*M_PI;
00025   EULERS_ASSIGN(*e, phi, theta, psi);
00026 
00027 }
00028 
00029 #endif /* AHRS_FLOAT_UTILS_H */
